name: fontes-widget-viewer
description: Visualize Flutter widget rendering in real-time during tests

fontesWidgetViewer.webPort.description: Port for the preview web server

fontesWidgetViewer.openInBrowser.description: Open preview in external browser instead of VSCode webview

scripts.sync-packages: rm -rf packages && mkdir -p packages && cp -r ../packages/preview_binding ../packages/preview_core ../packages/preview_viewer ../packages/mcp_preview packages/ && rm -rf packages/*/.dart_tool packages/*/build
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run sync-packages && npm run compile
scripts.package: npm run sync-packages && npm run compile && npx @vscode/vsce package --allow-missing-repository
